items.title: Nintendo Direct goes live today – one of the biggest and longest ever
items.summary:
Nintendo Direct goes live this morning, and it’s going to be a big one folks. Nintendo has not been tight about livestream events in this the year of its new next-generation console, from three major dedicated showcases for its biggest new Switch 2 game releases, as well as an IndieWorld and a Partner Showcase that perhaps seemed worse then they were just because Silksong wasn’t in them. But Silksong has released, and we already have all the details and a release date on the new Kirby Air Riders – today’s show is going to be one of the biggest Nintendo Direct livestreams ever and the first proper showing since Switch 2 barely had a chance to touch down on store shelves before we all scooped them up.

Source: the clause rescinding Microsoft's access to OpenAI's most powerful tech if OpenAI develops AGI remains part of their new deal, but it has been modified  —  The start-up reached a tentative deal with Microsoft, its biggest investor, and said it would give a $100 billion stake to the nonprofit that manages it.

items.title: Winklevosses' crypto exchange Gemini raises $425M in its IPO, selling about 15.2M shares for $28 each after marketing them for $24 to $26 apiece (Bloomberg)
items.summary:
Bloomberg:
Winklevosses' crypto exchange Gemini raises $425M in its IPO, selling about 15.2M shares for $28 each after marketing them for $24 to $26 apiece  —  Gemini Space Station Inc. raised $425 million in an initial public offering, pricing its stock above a marketed range and shrinking the number of shares.

items.title: Albania appoints an AI bot named Diella as the minister responsible for managing and awarding all public procurement tenders to combat corruption (Reuters)
items.summary:
Reuters:
Albania appoints an AI bot named Diella as the minister responsible for managing and awarding all public procurement tenders to combat corruption  —  A new minister in Albania charged to handle public procurement will be impervious to bribes, threats, or attempts to curry favour.

items.title: A California bill that would regulate AI companion chatbots is close to becoming law

items.title: Apple’s latest iPhone security feature just made life more difficult for spyware makers

items.title: Apple’s 15-inch 16GB, 24GB, and 32GB M4 MacBook Air configs are $200 off today
items.summary:
We had a good long run of $200 off price drops on Apple’s latest M4 MacBook Air at Amazon, but that time has come and gone now. However, B&H has brought back a few different 15-inch models with the same $200 price drops alongside upgraded specs that might be of interest for folks looking towards a more powerful setup without getting into the M4 MacBook Pro lineup. 

more…

items.title: EcoFlow’s parallel Outdoor Sale gears you up for adventures in nature with up to 62% discounts starting from $90
items.summary:
Running alongside its Home Backup/Hurricane Preparedness Sale, EcoFlow also has a separate Outdoor Sale running through September 14 with up to 62% discounts on power stations, power banks, and bundles tailored for adventures in nature, complete with bonus savings. Among the lineup, we spotted EcoFlow’s DELTA 2 Max Portable Power Station bundled with an 800W alternator charger at $1,139.05 shipped, after using the code 25EFDCAFF at checkout for a bonus 5% off, which beats out Amazon’s pricing by $760. This bundle fetches $2,498 at full price direct from the brand, though it can usually be found for $1,899 at Amazon. Discounts over the year have dropped costs as low as $1,049, with those two deals both happening in July. The deal we’re seeing here is a combined $1,359 markdown off the MSRP, which lands it at the second-lowest price we have tracked. Head below for more on this combo and the others that are perfect companions for fall adventures and more.

more…

items.title: Amazon takes 50% off three pairs of sport sunglasses, now just $3.50 a pop
items.summary:
KALIYADI Polarized Sport Sunglasses (3-pack)

Buy for $11 (Reg. $22)

What we love

Opt for the modern take of sport sunglasses with today’s notable markdown. For $11, you’re getting not one, not two, but three pairs. Quick math will tell you that you’re spending just north of $3.50 each on these. I like that there are a variety of colors that include blue, gray, and red.

items.title: Restock your closet while these button down dress shirts are priced as low as $13.50
items.summary:
Alimens & Gentle Button Down Dress Shirt

Buy from $13.50 (Reg. $19)

What we love

It’s easy to spend a lot of money on dress shirts, but you don’t have to with today’s deal. Pricing here kicks off at just $13.50, and generally only goes as high as $15 for most sizes and styles. There are loads of colors to pick from, allowing you to shake up your look without breaking the bank. 

more…

items.title: Govee’s Outdoor Light Show Box will have all of your outdoor illumination dancing to the same tune for just $30
items.summary:
Govee Outdoor Light Show Box

Buy for $30 (Reg. $40)

What we love

Entering into fall means that holiday light shows are on the horizon – and this handy Govee light show box can sync and streamline up to 10 of the brand’s outdoor lighting devices with 22 different music modes and 20 scene modes. What’s more, the IP65 construction allows it to handle weather changes and temperatures between 14 and 113 degrees, and its 2,500mAh battery also provides a 12-hour wireless runtime on one full charge.

more…

items.title: Get your M4 Mac mini under the desk or on the wall with this aluminum mount for $21 (Reg. $40)
items.summary:
SABRENT M4 Mac mini Aluminum Mount

Buy for $21 (Reg. $40)

Prime-exclusive discount

What we love

While it’s easy to argue that the M4 Mac mini doesn’t take up much space at all, who wouldn’t like to have a bit more room on top of their desk? This aluminum mount is ready to help with a simplistic design that is outfitted with rubber pads throughout to hold your device in place, without scratching it. The mount can be used on the wall, under a desk, and more.

items.title: Hiboy’s Fall Sale takes up to 50% off EVs, like the new and improved EX6F Folding e-bike at  $980 (Reg. $1,580)
items.summary:
Hiboy has launched its Fall Sale that is taking up to 50% off its lineup of e-bikes and e-scooters, with three tiers of extra savings at certain price thresholds. Among the lineup, we spotted the brand’s new EX6F Low-Step Foldable e-bike at $979.98 shipped, after using the code FALL20 at checkout, which beats out Amazon’s current pricing by $170. This model hit the market mid-June with a $1,580 price tag, which has mostly kept down at $1000 in sales since, save for the original launch deal that saw it drop to $950. The deal we’re seeing during this sale is a combined 38% markdown that cuts $600 off the tag for the second-lowest price we have tracked. Head below for more on this model and the many others we’re seeing during this event.

more…

items.title: Slide your AirPods, wallet, sunglasses, iPhone, and more in tomtoc’s 3L sling bag at $36.50
items.summary:
tomtoc 3L Compact EDC Sling Bag

Buy for $36.50 (Reg. $43)

Clip the on-page 15% off coupon.

What we love

Several months back I picked up a sling bag like this for when I leave the house. Now I can grab one thing and know that everything I need is in there. This ranges from sunglasses to mints, earbuds, my debit card, car key, and more. This 3L bag will offer plenty of space for that list and more.

more…

items.title: All of the best iPhone 17 case deals: Exclusive discounts, launch bundles, and more
items.summary:
The usual truckload of new iPhone 17 cases have arrived, and we have already rounded up many of our favorites with more to come. But this is the place to find all of the models that are already seeing price drops, be it exclusive deals we have secured for readers, or early launch deals brands are offering. Whether you’re looking for your forever case, or just something to keep things secure in the early days, it is at least worth a quick look to see if any of the models that are now on sale will work for you.

more…

items.title: New ‘Super Mario Galaxy’ movie might have leaked ahead of tomorrow’s Nintendo Direct
items.summary:
The first big animated Super Mario Bros. movie was beloved by just about everyone, and a major success for Nintendo. We already know it is officially in the lab on the sequel, or at least the next Mario movie, and with the 40th anniversary of Super Mario Bros. just days away, we could be in for a major reveal. Considering tomorrow will see the biggest and longest proper Nintendo Direct basically ever, that reveal could be happening much sooner than later – right after leaks surfaced suggesting the next Mario movie is headed to the stars. 

more…
